Commands.Big Shot: Ranged BRV attack  Grants 「Small Physical Attack Up」 for 2 turns
Commands.Grenade Bomb: Ranged AoE BRV attack  Grants 1 stack of 「AVALANCHE」 for 3 turns (max stacks is 5)   「AVALANCHE」 has the following effects:  - Raises party Max BRV and Attack based on the number of stacks  - Further raises own Max BRV and Attack
Commands.Physical Attack All: Slightly raises party Physical Attack for 3 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Satellite Beam: 15-HIT AoE ranged BRV+HP attack  BRV hits are dispersed when there are multiple enemies  BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV  HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemies  Grants 「Satellite」 for 3 turns    While 「Satellite」 is active:  - Adds the following 「Beam」 attack after every HP attack except during a Chase Sequence  　∟ 4-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack  　∟ Converts 100% of HP damage dealt to BRV   「Satellite」 raises critical hit rate

Passives.Big Shot Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Big Shot
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.Grenade Bomb Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Grenade Bomb
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy
Passives.Planet's Protector: Slightly raises party Max BRV and Attack while  AVALANCHE  is active
Passives.Big Shot Extend: Big Shot  use +2When using  Big Shot :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 6- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV- Slightly improves  Physical Attack Up , extends its duration by 2 turns and grants it to allies too- Triggers an HP attack after use
Passives.Buff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while buffed
Passives.Grenade Bomb Extend: When using  Grenade Bomb :- Increases the number of BRV hits to 8- Tremendously raises total BRV potency- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Extends the duration of  AVALANCHE  by 2 turns- Triggers an AoE HP attack after use- HP damage dealt is split amongst all enemiesWhile  AVALANCHE  is active:-  BRV Attack  turns to  BRV Attack+    Increases the number of BRV hits to 2   Greatly raises total BRV potency-  HP Attack  turns to  HP Attack+    Ranged BRV+HP attack
Passives.Resonance of Destruction and Power: Raises party Max BRV and Attack by 10%
Passives.Physical Attack All Extend: When using  Physical Attack All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises party Max BRV Overflow limit

Weapons.W Machine Gun CP: 35: When using  Grenade Bomb :- Raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to a single target- Grants two additional stacks of  AVALANCHE  and extends its duration
Weapons.Enemy Launcher CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Satellite Beam
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Physical Attack All  use +1Duration of  Physical Attack All  effects +2 turns
Weapons.Assault Gun CP: 15: When using  Big Shot :- Raises BRV potency- Improves  Physical Attack Up  and extends its duration
